\item Let X be a binomial random variable with parameters  $\brak{11,\displaystyle{\frac{1}{3}}}$. At which value(s) of k is $\Pr\brak{X = k}$ maximized?\\
\begin{enumerate}
\item k=2
\item k=3
\item k=4
\item k=5
\end{enumerate}

\end{enumerate}
